alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 20 at 7:14PM MDT until August 22 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MONDAY TO 3 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft, Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM Monday to 3 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
